long_description: The powerful and portable Bushnell SolarBook 850 solar battery charger supplies a dual, on-board, long-life lithium ion battery and two USB outputs to keep your devices charged when you're on the go. Durable, flexible solar panels offer high solar collectivity, even in less than full sun conditions; they fold up into a compact and easy-to-pack protective case. Additional length of the SolarBook 850 cuts solar charge time by 2.5 hours, compared to the SolarBook 600. Includes two USB outputs for charging multiple devices; one microUSB input for charging from a wall outlet. On-board lithium ion battery charges in approximately 3.5 hrs. in full sunlight or 6 hrs. from a wall outlet; power gauge provides easy-to-read battery level indicator. Fully charged, the 5-volt, 1-amp battery can charge a camera or GPS up to five times, an MP3 player up to three times, a smartphone up to two times. The Bushnell SolarBook 850 solar battery charger can also provide a tablet with up to a half charge.
short_description: The powerful and portable Bushnell SolarBook 850 solar battery charger supplies a dual, on-board, long-life lithium ion battery and two USB outputs to keep your devices charged when you're on the go.
